class.name: Node1D
class.brief_description: A 1D game object, inherited by all 1D-related nodes. Has a position, scale, and Z index.
class.description: A 1D game object, with a position, scale, and Z index. All 1D nodes, including physics objects and sprites, inherit from Node1D. Use Node1D as a parent node to move and scale children in a 1D project. The node's render order is determined by the Z index.

method.name: apply_scale
method.description: Multiplies the current scale by the [code]ratio[/code] value.

method.name: translate
method.description: Translates the node by the given [code]offset[/code] in local coordinates.

members.member: The global position of this node. Prefer using [member position] instead if you don't specifically need global.
The global scale of this node. Prefer using [member scale] instead if you don't specifically need global.
The position of this node, relative to the node's parent.
The scale of this node, relative to the node's parent. Unscaled value: [code]1.0[/code].

If [code]true[/code], the node's Z index is relative to its parent's Z index. If this node's Z index is 2 and its parent's effective Z index is 3, then this node's effective Z index will be 2 + 3 = 5.

Z index. Affects the order in which the nodes render. A node with a higher Z index will display in front of others. Must be between [constant RenderingServer.CANVAS_ITEM_Z_MIN] and [constant RenderingServer.CANVAS_ITEM_Z_MAX] (inclusive).
